basics.name: Kirsten Takanishi
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: I have graduated with B.A. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences, along with a minor in Business Administration at the University of Hawaii as of Fall 2019.

highlights: Created a malware analysis framework that combines multiple analysis tools into one package
Made the GUI version to replace command line arguments using Tkinter
Implemented a module directly aimed towards classifying and analyzing malware samples by using  preset rules or creating new rules
Programmed Webex bot in SQL and Python
Met with vendors to learn the consulting end of the company
Worked with AP maps and predictives for Kamehameha Schools
Practiced Defcon and CCNA challenges
Worked with hardware at HMSA to prepare for cutovers

work.company: Office of Enterprise Technology Services, State of Hawaii
highlights: Personal intern of CIO Todd Nacapuy
Attended meetings to learn the “language” of the higher-ups
Developed HACC Logo for 2017
Assisted students in the Prep course with Javascript
Taught the Windows commands (Devleague mostly runs with Macs/Linux)
Assist patrons with menu information and provide recommendations
Grilling and bartending to achieve skills in cooking and making drinks
Enhance patron dining experience by identifying and responding to special request
Safeguard the restaurant by adhering to safety and sanitation policies

volunteer.organization: ICS Grey Hats Cyber Security Club
highlights: Participate in CTF competitions
Learn how to use different languages
Work as teams towards offense and defense
Find internship opportunities
Learn how to do interviews and build your resume

volunteer.organization: Kaiser High School American Red Cross Club
highlights: CPR training

volunteer.organization: Kaiser High School Hawaiian Humane Society Club
highlights: Help dogs get adopted
Teach other students how to alleviate animal issues within the community
Teach others the basics of different types of dance
Learn how to create choreography
